name: Retail Customer Cohort Analysis
desc: The project employs Power BI for retail cohort analysis, covering retention, performance, churn, churned customer insights, and recovered customer assessment.

name: Job Market Analysis
desc: The project offers an in-depth exploration of the job market using Power BI, aiming to provide insights into job trends, skill demand, and geographical distribution of opportunities.

name: Adventure Work Bike Shop Data Analysis
desc: Build an interactive dashboard using Power BI to analyze and visualize data from the Maven Analytics Adventure Works dataset.
